segments.text: I notice the woman’s calm demeanor as she works away at the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's almost admirable how she’s so engaged in drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But what a mess is brewing behind her back!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That boy’s about to climb further, and I can see the stool wobbling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how she’s completely oblivious to the chaos happening right next to her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks inviting, like a little slice of safety.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But inside, things are about to go downhill fast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find it amusing how the girl is so eager, hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It’s a small act of rebellion, one driven by the thrill of sneaking a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet, that thrill could lead to a real disaster if the boy falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s got that look of expectation, and it’s both sweet and nerve-wracking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but feel a pang of concern for everyone in this scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If only she could be aware of the impending chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This moment is so innocent, but it teeters on the edge of disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Every second counts; I just hope someone notices soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
